title: Newton's Method With $$n=4$$
text: To find $$x_4$$, use the equation $$x_n=x_n-1-\frac{f{\left(x_n-1\right)}}{\operatorname{f'}\left(x_n-1\right)}$$ with $$n=4$$ and the value of $$x_3$$ stored on the calculator.
